byline.original: By CHRISTOPHER MELE and CAMPBELL ROBERTSON

lead_paragraph: The New Orleans police said the driver was taken into custody and was being investigated for drunken driving. None of the injuries were considered life-threatening.
snippet: The New Orleans police said the driver was taken into custody and was being investigated for drunken driving. None of the injuries were considered life-threatening....

headline.main: Pickup Plows Into Crowd at a Mardi Gras Parade, Injuring 28
headline.print_headline: Truck Plows Into Crowd at Mardi Gras Parade; 28 Hurt
